topics.body:
Morning, people.
Now, as you are here, I want you to imagine this thread as a studio used to make movies and TV sitcoms.

I will be the chief script writer (or head writer) among a group of unspecified writers.
What shall be your roles is up to you. Only because I don't remember most of you.
